snippet: Representative Mark Sanford of South Carolina has gone from the Love Guv to the Facebook Congressman.
abstract: Gail Collins Op-Ed column laments that Rep Mark Sanford, whose Facebook posts about his breakup with his Argentine fiancee point to his tremendous self-absorption, is running for re-election unopposed in South Carolina; notes Sanford has defined himself as exact incumbent most voters would make a special trip to polls to vote against; regrets that no Democratic candidate has come to fore in state where its party has suffered series of embarrassments.
lead_paragraph: Representative Mark Sanford of South Carolina has gone from the Love Guv to the Facebook Congressman.

headline.seo: Mark Sanford Just Can’t Stop Sharing
headline.main: Sex Is the Least of It
headline.print_headline: Sex Is the Least of It
